question: What is the full name of the fund with ticker VTI?
expected_cypher: MATCH (f:Fund {ticker: 'VTI'}) RETURN f.name AS name

question: Which is the security exchange that VTI is listed on?
expected_cypher: MATCH (f:Fund {ticker: 'VTI'}) RETURN f.securityExchange AS exchange

question: What is the expense ratio for VTI?
expected_cypher: MATCH (f:Fund {ticker: 'VTI'}) RETURN f.expenseRatio AS expenseRatio

question: How many holdings does the fund VTI have in total?
expected_cypher: MATCH (f:Fund {ticker: 'VTI'})-[:HAS_PORTFOLIO]->(:Portfolio)-[:CONTAINS]->(h:Holding) RETURN count(h) AS holdingsCount, f.ticker AS ticker, f.name AS fundName

question: What is the portfolio turnover rate for VTI?
expected_cypher: MATCH (f:Fund {ticker: 'VTI'}) RETURN f.turnoverRate AS turnoverRate

question: What are the advisory fees for VTI?
expected_cypher: MATCH (f:Fund {ticker: 'VTI'}) RETURN f.advisoryFees AS advisoryFees

question: Calculate the cost per 10k investment for VTI.
expected_cypher: MATCH (f:Fund {ticker: 'VTI'}) RETURN f.costsPer10k AS cost

question: Find the ticker symbol for the fund named 'Vanguard Total Stock Market Index Fund'.
expected_cypher: MATCH (f:Fund {name: 'Vanguard Total Stock Market Index Fund'}) RETURN f.ticker AS ticker

question: Which Trust issues the fund VTI?
expected_cypher: MATCH (t:Trust)-[:ISSUES]->(f:Fund {ticker: 'VTI'}) RETURN t.name AS trustName

question: Who is the provider that manages the VTI fund?
expected_cypher: MATCH (p:Provider)-[:MANAGES]->(:Trust)-[:ISSUES]->(f:Fund {ticker: 'VTI'}) RETURN p.name AS providerName

question: What share class does VTI belong to?
expected_cypher: MATCH (f:Fund {ticker: 'VTI'})-[:HAS_SHARE_CLASS]->(sc:ShareClass) RETURN sc.name AS shareClass

question: Get the description of the share class for VTI.
expected_cypher: MATCH (f:Fund {ticker: 'VTI'})-[:HAS_SHARE_CLASS]->(sc:ShareClass) RETURN sc.description AS description

question: Return both the expense ratio and the turnover rate for VTI.
expected_cypher: MATCH (f:Fund {ticker: 'VTI'}) RETURN f.expenseRatio AS expenseRatio, f.turnoverRate AS turnoverRate

question: What is the net assets value recorded for the fund VTI?
expected_cypher: MATCH (f:Fund {ticker: 'VTI'}) RETURN f.netAssets

question: List the tickers of all funds managed by the provider 'Vanguard'.
expected_cypher: MATCH (p:Provider {name: 'Vanguard'})-[:MANAGES]->(:Trust)-[:ISSUES]->(f:Fund) RETURN f.ticker AS ticker

question: Find all funds with an expense ratio less than 0.05.
expected_cypher: MATCH (f:Fund) WHERE f.expenseRatio < 0.05 RETURN f.name AS name

question: What is the security exchange and the number of holdings for VTI?
expected_cypher: MATCH (f:Fund {ticker: 'VTI'}) RETURN f.securityExchange AS exchange, f.numberHoldings AS holdings

question: Does VTI have a turnover rate higher than 10%?
expected_cypher: MATCH (f:Fund {ticker: 'VTI'}) RETURN f.turnoverRate > 10 AS isHighTurnover

question: Which funds are issued by 'Vanguard Index Funds' trust?
expected_cypher: MATCH (t:Trust {name: 'Vanguard Index Funds'})-[:ISSUES]->(f:Fund) RETURN f.name AS fundName

question: Retrieve the full metadata (name, exchange, expense ratio) for VTI.
expected_cypher: MATCH (f:Fund {ticker: 'VTI'}) RETURN f.name AS name, f.securityExchange AS exchange, f.expenseRatio AS expenseRatio

question: What is the total number of holdings for the Vanguard Small Cap Fund?
expected_cypher: MATCH (f:Fund {name: 'Vanguard Small-Cap Index Fund'})-[:HAS_PORTFOLIO]->(:Portfolio)-[:CONTAINS]->(h:Holding) WITH f, count(h) AS holdingCount WHERE holdingCount > 100 RETURN f.ticker, holdingCount

question: Show me the costs per 10k for all funds listed on NASDAQ.
expected_cypher: MATCH (f:Fund) WHERE f.securityExchange = 'NASDAQ' RETURN f.ticker AS ticker, f.costsPer10k AS cost

question: Who manages the trust for the fund with turnover rate 0.04?
expected_cypher: MATCH (p:Provider)-[:MANAGES]->(:Trust)-[:ISSUES]->(f:Fund) WHERE f.turnoverRate = 0.04 RETURN p.name AS providerName

question: Are there any funds with more than 5000 holdings?
expected_cypher: MATCH (f:Fund) WHERE f.numberHoldings > 5000 RETURN f.name AS fundName

question: Who are the managers of the Vanguard Mid Cap Growth fund?
expected_cypher: MATCH (f:Fund {name: 'Vanguard Mid-Cap Growth Index Fund'})-[:MANAGED_BY]->(p:Person) RETURN p.name AS managerName

question: What is the investment objective text for Vanguard S&P 500 fund?
expected_cypher: MATCH (f:Fund {name: 'Vanguard S&P 500 Index Fund'})-[:DEFINED_BY]->(:Profile)-[:HAS_OBJECTIVE]->(o:Objective) RETURN o.text AS objective

question: What is the investment objective text for VOO?
expected_cypher: MATCH (f:Fund {ticker: 'VOO'})-[:DEFINED_BY]->(:Profile)-[:HAS_OBJECTIVE]->(o:Objective) RETURN o.text AS objective

question: What are the main risks described for VTI?
expected_cypher: MATCH (f:Fund {ticker: 'VTI'})-[:DEFINED_BY]->(:Profile)-[:HAS_RISK]->(r:RiskChunk) RETURN r.title AS riskTitle, r.text AS riskDescription

question: Get the performance commentary for VTI.
expected_cypher: MATCH (f:Fund {ticker: 'VTI'})-[:DEFINED_BY]->(:Profile)-[:HAS_PERFORMANCE]->(pc:PerformanceCommentary) RETURN pc.text AS performance

question: What charts are available for VTI?
expected_cypher: MATCH (f:Fund {ticker: 'VTI'})-[:HAS_CHART]->(img:Image) RETURN img.title AS chartTitle, img.category AS category

question: What are the top 5 holdings for VTI?
expected_cypher: MATCH (f:Fund {ticker: 'VTI'})-[:HAS_PORTFOLIO]->(:Portfolio)-[:CONTAINS]->(h:Holding) RETURN h.name AS holdingName, h.weight AS weight ORDER BY weight DESC LIMIT 5

question: Show me what is the 1y, 5y and inception return of the VTI fund?
expected_cypher: MATCH (f:Fund {ticker: 'VTI'})-[:HAS_TRAILING_PERFORMANCE]->(p:TrailingPerformance) RETURN p.return1y AS oneYear, p.return5y AS fiveYear, p.returnInception AS inception

question: What is the name of the fund that has the greates annual returns since inception?
expected_cypher: MATCH (f:Fund)-[:HAS_TRAILING_PERFORMANCE]->(p:TrailingPerformance) RETURN f.name AS fundName, p.returnInception AS inceptionReturn ORDER BY inceptionReturn DESC LIMIT 1

question: Find the provider managing funds with the lowest average turnover rate.
expected_cypher: MATCH (p:Provider)-[:MANAGES]->(:Trust)-[:ISSUES]->(f:Fund) WITH p, avg(f.turnoverRate) AS avgTurnover RETURN p.name AS provider, avgTurnover ORDER BY avgTurnover ASC LIMIT 1

question: Which holding has the highest weight across all portfolios?
expected_cypher: MATCH (:Fund)-[:HAS_PORTFOLIO]->(:Portfolio)-[c:CONTAINS]->(h:Holding) RETURN h.name AS holdingName, h.ticker AS ticker, max(c.weight) AS maxWeight ORDER BY maxWeight DESC LIMIT 1

question: List all funds that share at least one manager with VTI.
expected_cypher: MATCH (f1:Fund {ticker: 'VTI'})-[:MANAGED_BY]->(p:Person)<-[:MANAGED_BY]-(f2:Fund) WHERE f1 <> f2 RETURN DISTINCT f2.ticker AS ticker, f2.name AS name, p.name AS sharedManager

question: What percentage of VTI's holdings are US-based companies?
expected_cypher: MATCH (f:Fund {ticker: 'VTI'})-[:HAS_PORTFOLIO]->(:Portfolio)-[:CONTAINS]->(h:Holding) WITH count(h) AS total, count(CASE WHEN h.country = 'US' THEN 1 END) AS usCount RETURN (usCount * 100.0 / total) AS percentageUS

question: Show me the tickets of the Vanguard Total Stock Market and the main information about each one of them
expected_cypher: MATCH (f:Fund {name: 'Vanguard Total Stock Market Index Fund'}) RETURN f.ticker AS ticker, f.name AS name, f.securityExchange AS exchange, f.costsPer10k AS cost, f.advisoryFees AS fee, f.numberHoldings AS holdings, f.expenseRatio AS ratio, f.netAssets AS assets, f.turnoverRate AS turnover

question: Show me the ordered list of funds in decreasing order of the 5 year returns
expected_cypher: MATCH (f:Fund)-[:HAS_TRAILING_PERFORMANCE]->(p:TrailingPerformance) WHERE p.return_5y IS NOT NULL RETURN f.name AS fundName, p.return_5y AS fiveYearReturn ORDER BY fiveYearReturn DESC

question: Show me the fund that has the best total return in the year 2022
expected_cypher: MATCH (f:Fund)-[r:HAS_FINANCIAL_HIGHLIGHT]->(fh:FinancialHighlight) WHERE fh.totalReturn IS NOT NULL AND r.year = 2022 RETURN f.name AS fundName, r.year AS year, fh.totalReturn AS totalReturn ORDER BY totalReturn DESC LIMIT 1

question: What are the risks fo the fund VTI?
expected_cypher: MATCH (f:Fund {ticker: 'VTI'})-[:DEFINED_BY]->(:Profile)-[:HAS_RISK]->(r:RiskChunk) RETURN r.text AS risk

question: What are the strategies of the fund VTI?
expected_cypher: MATCH (f:Fund {ticker: 'VTI'})-[:DEFINED_BY]->(:Profile)-[:HAS_STRATEGY]->(s:StrategyChunk) RETURN s.text AS strategy

question: Show me all the funds that are Insitutional Plus Shares share class?
expected_cypher: MATCH (f:Fund)-[:HAS_SHARE_CLASS]->(:ShareClass {name: 'Insitutional Plus Shares'}) RETURN f.name AS fundName

question: Show me all the funds that have more than 15% invested in United States
expected_cypher: MATCH (f:Fund)-[h:HAS_GEOGRAPHIC_ALLOCATION]->(:Region {name: 'United States'}) WHERE h.weight > 15.0 RETURN f.name AS fundName
